IPFilter.dat is a list of IP addresses generated with BlockListManager, which blocks P2P hostile IPs.

if you are unfamiliar with ip filter auto updaters, you can simply use this single file to let utorrent block these IPs.

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â»ViSTA;

C:\Users\USERNAME\AppData\Roaming\utorrent

Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â»XP;

C:\Documents & Settings\USERNAME\Application Data\uTorrent


ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢additionalÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢infoÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢

if you think you are somehow getting low download speeds, you can simply disable the filter by deleting the file or by going to advanced options menu and setting ipfilter.enable to false.
